name: Military Defense War
description:
Military Defense War is a story based game in which a real hero take the responsibility to escape their home land free from enemies. they areout of reach of police men to hide themselves in the city of warriors. Few days ago some terrorists broke the border line and destroy some base camp and turn the environment in an extreme level of chaos. Use your fighting skills to smash these terrorist and clear base. Clean your hands on all of sub machine guns of victorious stealth and power in fatal blow.


Military Defense War: Features

Realistic Game Theme.
User friendly game environment.
Multi level story based game play.
Different weapons for self defence.
High level 3D Graphics and animations.
